website_summaries.verdict: If you feel tied down by all the cables and plugs in your life, consider this model – it's known for having a longer battery life than most others.
pros: Multisport mode tracks running, biking, swimming, gym workouts, and treadmill work
Measures time, distance, speed, pace, calories burned, and sleep
cons: Does not auto-sense the type of workout you are doing

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. Large display
customer_reviews.text: Came very promptly. Love this watch. This is my second. Bought it as a back up for a marathon weekend just in case my battery doesn’t seem like it will hold up. Have had my first one for 2 years
customer_reviews.author: bamagirl14

customer_reviews.title: It is NOT what they sell.
customer_reviews.text: The watch’s battery only lasts 1 hour and a half. It DOES NOT read the heart rate. I filed a refund and I have to pay a 10% return fee FOR AN ITEM THAT DOES NOT WORK CORRECTLY. Terrible service. I al completely Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: gustalpavo

customer_reviews.title: great watch
customer_reviews.text: good watch. Little big for my tiny wrists, but other than that it is great
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith-Sattison

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works ok but I wish I wld have go the one with the heart rate monitor on it.
customer_reviews.author: EMcNeil

customer_reviews.title: While working it was a good product but now that the buttons are not working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little less than a year ago, and the buttons stopped working already. I have been using this weekly 3 days or so. While working it was a good product but now that the buttons are not working, It is useless for me. Will not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Tomtom Spark 3
customer_reviews.text: The product delivers what it is advertised as! My wife was looking for a low budget Triathlon watch. She is very pleased that it works well! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Verreynne

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! First one delivered had a issue but I asked for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Vb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product so far
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product so far, one week in, but disappointed that it was actually nearly $20 cheaper for this model on tomtom.com and I realized that too late.
customer_reviews.author: Ckdub

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Great value and was exactly what I was looking for - I bought the watch as a birthday gift for my daughter, who is a runner, and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Melody Hargraves

customer_reviews.title: I thought this fitness watch could track heart rate and ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this fitness watch could track heart rate and calories and it does not which is the most important feature I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Lucila Mena

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of the watch and the functionality of ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the watch and the functionality of the watch. I did not give five stars, though, because the sleep tracker DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this watch. I run OCR's and wanted to use in races. Unfortunately, it won't pick up satellite abd stays on "please wait" indefinitely. Then after only a few races, it is extremely difficult to even navigate the right, left, up, down. It seems stuck. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this watch because I am training for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch because I am training for a half marathon. I wanted a watch that I could upload music into so I could run without my phone with me. This watch wasn’t compatible with uploading music.
customer_reviews.author: j. franzen

customer_reviews.title: Best feature is the sleep monitor
customer_reviews.text: I could not get some. of the features work such as heart rate monitor and syncing with my computer which involves many features. Best feature is the sleep monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Gross

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I have had the watch for six months now. Wear it every day. Love that it counts my laps in the pool and distance. If you are training for a triathlon, great watch at the price. You do have to manually move it through each discipline (swim, bike, run) The only con I experienced is that the pink color in the band faded from the pool chlorine.
customer_reviews.author: scooby27

customer_reviews.title: Gotta swing your arms for it to count steps
customer_reviews.text: I work in retail and wanted something that would tell me how far I walk every day- this watch does not register I am walking unless I am swinging my arms at my sides. I am often carrying things at work so this is not helpful. It is also a fairly bulky and thick device.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, it's everything it is meant to be! Quick on finding GPS location and very accurate as I've been comparing to a friends apple. Great product, great price
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette Hunt

customer_reviews.title: i don't know
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift and haven't heard back from user.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Meinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Solid product and easy to use. Great price for what you get. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McDevitt

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for awatch that also tells you how far/fast you've run
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a watch that also tells you how far/fast you've run, biked, swum, or hiked (including elevation and calorie count), then this is the watch for you. If you're looking for a lot of extra stuff, like heart rate, text messages, and phone calls, then get something more expensive. I figure my phone is expensive enough, and a watch should, before all else, tell time. I've been using this watch for 2.5 years, and other than having to change the band out when it wore down after 1 year of constant use in and out of the pool, I haven't had any issues. I've probably swum about 100 miles with this watch so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY, no replacement adapter available
customer_reviews.text: TOMTOM has the worst customer support I've ever seen. For a year, I've been waiting on a replacement adapter/charger. It's tiny, so it's easy to misplace. I bought a generic charger off Amazon, and it will charge the device but not sync it to the computer to upload my activities. So basically the watch is useless, and there's no way to speak to a representative from TOMTOM about it. It asked you to contact them by chat, but my account also seems to be gone because I can't login or reset my Password. DON'T BUY THIS WATCH.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great fitness watch! Perfect size for female athlete
customer_reviews.text: Love this fitness watch. It is easy to read. It has running, biking, swimming programs and others. I have been using it to train for a triathlon and it is just what I needed. I like that it shows the mileage and the calories. The only thing I would change is the every time you connect it to computer to charge and update it defaults to KM so I have to remember to always back to units under options to change it to miles. It is the perfect size and I like you can change out the watch band. It does have the heart rate setting on here but I did not purchase the heart rate monitor.
customer_reviews.author: 1st review

product_meta.title: TomTom Spark, GPS Fitness Watch (Small, Sky Captain/Pink)
product_meta.description: Capture every active minute of your day. Sprints, strolls, stairs, steps. Every active minute counts. Tracking your moves all day, it all adds up to time, distance and calories burned.
feature_bullets: 24/7 Fitness Tracker: Track your activity all day
Waterproof Sport Watch: Multisport Mode to mix up your training; Run;Bike; Gym;Swim; Treadmill
GPS Running Watch and Activity Tracker: Measures time, distance, speed, pace, calories burned, and sleep; Live stats, on the go
GPS Watch with Advanced Features: The Spark is a 24/7 fitness tracker that keeps you motivated

Activity Watch with Long Lasting Battery: Sync, store, share and study your session on your favorite apps, recharge with included USB charging cable (Long lasting battery with activity tracking up to 3 weeks and GPS tracking up to 11 hours)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars29 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
